Title: House Guest
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Kat Morris (story), Hellen Jo, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: With his van wrecked and leg broken, Greg convinces Steven and the gems to let him live with them while Pearl repairs the van and Steven try out his healing powers.
